cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Financial Services on April 21, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2553, Real Estate Valuation Fairness and Improvement Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 65 (Thursday, April 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CLEAVER:
H.R. 2553.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1 of the United States
Constitution
[Page H1843]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Real Estate Valuation Fairness and Improvement Act of 2021
